abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32226289, pmid32229706, pmid32229155, pmid32231349, pmid32229732, pmid32229257, pmid32233040, pmid32237278
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.04.02
